StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PrecursorsEnigma_Dec
StringTable.String: Convinced that the enigmatic Precursors live among us, potentially stirring both awe and tension.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DreadfulMelody_Dec
StringTable.String: Their lack of musical prowess has been known to stir diplomatic tensions and unintended laughter.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_RelativisticReunion_Dec
StringTable.String: Bearing the burden of time dilation, this leader grapples with an intense yearning for times once known.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_NamingGame_Dec
StringTable.String: Their quirky penchant for bestowing pet names may endear or alienate; the balance is always in flux.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SecretWatchers_Dec
StringTable.String: Bound to the clandestine group "The Watchers," they navigate a realm of peril and promise.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_NemesisLegacy_Dec
StringTable.String: Shadows of an old nemesis linger, influencing every diplomatic maneuver and battlefield strategy.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_MuteMysteries_Dec
StringTable.String: A shrouded past conceals mysteries that could sway cultural and governmental ties.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_LostColonyShip_Dec
StringTable.String: The haunting memory of an adrift colony ship forever lingers in their choices.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_UnfinishedAutobiography_Dec
StringTable.String: Ever-engrossed in penning their life's tale, often to the distraction of present duties.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_UnfulfilledDream_Dec
StringTable.String: Considers themselves something of a scientist despite having no formal education.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DarkPast_Dec
StringTable.String: A dark event from yesteryears makes them wary of dimly lit places, casting shadows on their decisions.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_ShadowlessArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries around an enigmatic shadowless artifact.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_HostageChild_Dec
StringTable.String: Raised as the hostage of a hostile group before returning to the Civilization of their parents.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_AncientBloodline_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries the weight of an age-old lineage.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_DocumentDestroyer_Dec
StringTable.String: Famed for verbal orders after an unfortunate document blunder, decisions now ride on recollections and swift redress.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_HereticPast_Dec
StringTable.String: Known for unorthodox beliefs and behaviors.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_FramedInnocent_Dec
StringTable.String: Once ensnared in a political conspiracy, charged with wrongs they didn't commit.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_PirateFamily_Dec
StringTable.String: Rumored to have ancestral ties with space brigands.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_SilverPlatter_Dec
StringTable.String: Raised in a life of luxury.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_Dreamer_Dec
StringTable.String: With a touch of chemical aid they claim to hold great sway over dreams.
